# Rocket module

In this section, you will find the documentation of the routines implemented to obtain the rocket propellant performance under ideal conditions.
Currently, there are two models implemented in the Combustion Toolbox:
   * IAC: Infinite-Area-Chamber,
   * FAC: Finite-Area-Chamber.

## RocketSolver

```{eval-rst}
.. currentmodule:: src.+combustiontoolbox.+rocket

.. automodule:: src.+combustiontoolbox.+rocket.@RocketSolver
   :show-inheritance:
   :members:
```
